ygData.subject: Re: A little ray of sunshine on an otherwise cloudy day
ygData.msgSnippet: I beleive the bonus is for SK above lvl 40, where they get 20 dmg per lvl instead of 10. so lvl 50 does 601, lvl 48 does 561, etc etc Inosolan
ygData.messageBody:
I beleive the bonus is for SK above lvl 40, where they get 20 dmg per lvl
instead of 10.
so lvl 50 does 601, lvl 48 does 561, etc etc

Inosolan

Countess Bathory D'Allatu wrote:

> From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
>
> It appears that the max damage for Harm Touch has been
> increased.
> I level 50 friend recently did 600ish.
> I have only used HT once since the supposed chance. I
> used it against Estrelle (or somehitng) in KK. It only
> did 169. So the resist is still there.
> Has anyone else noticed this, and have you figured out
> the new formula for it?
> Used to be: level * 10 + 1
> Example: level 20 * 10 + 1 = 201 DMG
>
> Could be that its after a certain level too.
>
> Anyway, I will be paying closer attention to it today.
> Maybe I'll just HT a giant rat or something.
>
> =====
> Wherever a Light shines .. a Shadow is born.
> Bathory D'Allatu
> Cazic-Thule
